mapper.select: SELECT b.mat_od_de_cd mat_od_de_cd, a.mat_code, c.mat_name, d.act_name, b.mat_test_date, e.err_info, a.mat_rt_amt, f.emp_name, a.mat_rt_date, a.mat_rt_sts FROM mat_rt a JOIN mat_test b ON(a.mat_test_code = b.mat_test_code) JOIN com_mat c ON(a.mat_code = c.mat_code) JOIN com_act d ON(a.act_code = d.act_code) JOIN com_err e ON(b.err_code = e.err_code) JOIN com_emp f ON(a.emp_code = f.emp_code) ORDER BY a.mat_rt_date DESC

SELECT b.mat_od_de_cd mat_od_de_cd, a.mat_code, c.mat_name, d.act_name, b.mat_test_date, e.err_info, a.mat_rt_amt, f.emp_name, a.mat_rt_date, a.mat_rt_sts FROM mat_rt a JOIN mat_test b ON(a.mat_test_code = b.mat_test_code) JOIN com_mat c ON(a.mat_code = c.mat_code) JOIN com_act d ON(a.act_code = d.act_code) JOIN com_err e ON(b.err_code = e.err_code) JOIN com_emp f ON(a.emp_code = f.emp_code)
AND a.mat_code LIKE '%' || #{materialCode} || '%'
AND a.act_code LIKE '%' || #{accountCode} || '%'
AND a.mat_rt_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND a.mat_rt_date <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY a.mat_rt_date DESC
